com.mobilab.accountservice.bussiness.process

Class BusinessHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mobilab.accountservice.bussiness.process.Handler
      • com.mobilab.accountservice.bussiness.process.BusinessHandler

  • public class BusinessHandler
extends Handler
    a process to handle database and business logic. it is consumer of requests procued by gateway and return responses to gateway.
